text: There were two Syracuse women in Greece, who had a prominent ass; and, knowing which of the sisters had it more gentle, hard and fleshy, they showed themselves naked to an expert who, after palping with sweet urge, offered the eldest her hand, as a reward. His brother took the not least handsome of the younger; they were happily married, and, after more than a pleasant periphery, in honour of the two erected a temple, with the name of:  Venus, butt recia. I don't know what the intention would have been, but it was this temple in Greece that I would have had the most devotion to. FIN
title: La Venus Callipyga
author: Jean de La Fontaine
